title: Nickelodeon Kart Racers 2: Grand Prix + Multiplayer
body:
Nickelodeon Kart Racers 2: Grand Prix + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Racing, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Bamtang Games, GameMill Publishing
Languages: ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 4.6 GB
Repack Size: 2 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive, + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by Gamesdrive, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Nickelodeon.Kart.Racers.2.Grand.Prix-DARKSiDERS ISO release: ds-nickelodeonkartracers2grandprix.iso (4,944,619,520 bytes)
  • CreamAPI-based Steamworks Fix is available in NoDVD folder after installation, allowing multiplayer support via Steam; check readme.txt in that folder for instructions; thanks to chronos!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.6 to 2 GB)
  • Installation takes 4-8 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 5 GB (~10 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in “ds.ini” file
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Nickelodeon Kart Racers is back and we’re kicking it into overdrive! In Nickelodeon Kart Racers 2: Grand Prix, you can select from 30 playable racers and 70 team members to assemble your ultimate pit crew. Choose your favorites from Nickelodeon’s hall of fame, including JoJo Siwa, SpongeBob SquarePants, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, the babies from Rugrats, the cool kids from Hey Arnold!, Ren and Stimpy, Lincoln Loud and his sisters, and more!
